roleset.name: (cause to) become dried out via an electric current
roleset.note: ELECTRODESICCATION-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to desiccate.01. Desiccate.01 is a member of vncls other_cos-45.4. Framed by Katie. (from electrodesiccation.01-n)

example.name: electrodesiccate-v
example.text: We gently electrodesiccated the surgical wound base without causing more harm.

example.name: electrodessication-n: arg 1
example.text: electrodesiccation of two squamous cell carcinomas
